Description: Simple cloth gloves providing minimal protection. Ideal for tasks requiring full dexterity and little combat risk.
Basic leather gauntlets that offer some protection against abrasions and minor impacts while allowing for flexibility.
Leather gauntlets with metal reinforcements, enhancing defense against cuts and blunt force without compromising grip.
Gloves with internal padding designed to absorb impact, offering moderate protection and cushioning against melee attacks.
Kevlar-lined gloves capable of resisting cuts, punctures, and small-caliber bullets, maintaining good dexterity.
Advanced Kevlar gauntlets with reinforced plates, providing enhanced protection against firearms while preserving some flexibility.
Gauntlets made of composite materials, offering balanced protection against various attacks while ensuring some degree of mobility.
Titanium-plated gauntlets providing strong defense against melee and ranged attacks without being overly cumbersome.
Lightweight gauntlets woven with titanium fibers, offering high durability and protection with minimal impact on dexterity.
Gauntlets embedded with ceramic plates, offering superior defense against ballistic and energy weapons.
Advanced plasteel gauntlets, highly resistant to energy and kinetic attacks while being lightweight for combat use.
Gauntlets treated with plasma hardening, offering exceptional resistance to energy and thermal attacks.
Flexible gauntlets made from nano-fiber mesh, providing high protection against physical and energy attacks while preserving full range of motion.
Gauntlets embedded with energy-diffusing tech, reducing damage from energy weapons and dissipating impact force.
Ultra-light gauntlets made from quantum fibers, offering superior protection without hindering dexterity or mobility.
Gauntlets enhanced with graviton technology, deflecting projectiles and dispersing impact to reduce injury.
Gauntlets interwoven with void energy, providing high resistance against physical, psionic, and energy attacks.
Nearly indestructible gauntlets offering unmatched protection, though their weight requires considerable strength to use effectively.
Gauntlets that phase through time, allowing the wearer to avoid incoming damage by shifting through temporal distortions.
Gauntlets infused with dark matter, capable of absorbing kinetic and energy attacks into an extradimensional space, reducing damage taken.
Gauntlets made from Etherium metal, providing high resistance to physical, energy, and psionic attacks while maintaining agility.
Psionically enhanced gauntlets that adapt to the wearerâ€™s mental commands, offering dynamic protection and enhancing grip strength.
Gauntlets made from hyper-alloy, offering near-impenetrable defense while preserving a reasonable weight for combat efficiency.
Gauntlets embedded with self-repairing nanites, ensuring continuous durability and protection in prolonged combat situations.
Gauntlets with embedded quantum fields, creating a protective barrier that deflects a wide range of attacks while maintaining full dexterity.
The ultimate gauntlets forged from hypersteel, offering unmatched resistance to all forms of damage while surprisingly preserving finger flexibility for complex tasks.
